void EXTI_ClearEdgeFlag ( u32  EXTI_Channel)

Clear the specified EXTI channelx edge flag.

Parameters:
EXTI_Channel,:specify the EXTI channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_0
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_1
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_2
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_3
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_4
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_5

  • EXTI_CHANNEL_11

  • EXTI_CHANNEL_13
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_14

void EXTI_DeInit ( u32  EXTI_Channel)

Deinitialize the EXTI peripheral registers.

Parameters:
EXTI_Channel,:can be 0, 1 to 15 to select the EXTI Channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_0
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_1
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_2
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_3
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_4
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_5

FlagStatus EXTI_GetEdgeStatus ( u32  EXTI_Channel,
u32  EXTI_Edge 
)

Get the specified EXTI channelx edge status.

Parameters:
EXTI_Channel,:specify the EXTI channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_0
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_1
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_2
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_3
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_4
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_5
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_6
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_7
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_8
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_9
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_10
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_11
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_12
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_13
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_14
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_15
EXTI_Edge,:can be status of edge that user want to monitor. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • EXTI_EDGE_POSITIVE
  • EXTI_EDGE_NEGATIVE
Return values:
SETor RESET

Definition at line 485 of file ht32f5xxxx_exti.c.

void EXTI_WakeupEventConfig ( u32  EXTI_Channel,
u8  EXTI_WakeUpType,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Configure the EXTI channelx event wakeup function.

Parameters:
EXTI_Channel,:specify the EXTI channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_0
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_1
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_2
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_3
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_4
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_5
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_6
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_7
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_8
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_9
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_10
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_11
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_12
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_13
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_14
  • EXTI_CHANNEL_15
EXTI_WakeUpType,:determines the type of signal to trigger EXTI interrupt. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • EXTI_WAKEUP_HIGH_LEVEL
  • EXTI_WAKEUP_LOW_LEVEL
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None
